page.title: 16GOVERNMENT IN COLERAINE
page.content: {THE COUNCIL OFFICES { --------------------- The council offices are housed in { {THE CLOONAVIN,}a large building situated in attractive grounds overlooking the River Bann.Once used as a hotel, the council purchased it some years ago as the council chambers.Elected councillors for the area hold their meetings here,and there is a large function room where conferences,youth parties, and meetings are held. The Mayor's parlour is used by the present mayor,Councillor William King,who has a farm outside Coleraine. There are offices to register births, marriages and deaths,and for licensing dogs.
